name: luau-lsp
description: A Language Server Client for Luau
author: JohnnyMorganz

commands.title: Luau: Compute Compiler Remarks for file
Luau: Compute CodeGen instructions for file
Luau: Flush Time Trace Events to tracing.json
Luau: View Require Graph for current file

luau.trace.server.markdownDescription: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Luau language server.

luau-lsp.server.path.markdownDescription: Path to the Luau LSP server binary. If not provided, uses the binary included in the extension.

luau-lsp.server.communicationChannel.markdownDescription: Type of communication channel to use for communicating with the server. Only useful for debug purposes
enumDescriptions: Communicate via UNIX socket files. Useful for debugging

luau-lsp.server.delayStartup.markdownDescription: Make the server spin indefinitely when starting up to allow time to attach a debugger. Only useful for debug purposes

luau-lsp.server.baseLuaurc.markdownDescription: Path to a `.luaurc` file which acts as the default baseline Luau configuration

luau-lsp.ignoreGlobs.markdownDescription: Diagnostics will not be reported for any file matching these globs unless the file is currently open

luau-lsp.sourcemap.enabled.markdownDescription: Whether Rojo sourcemap parsing is enabled

luau-lsp.sourcemap.autogenerate.markdownDescription: Automatically run the `rojo sourcemap` command to regenerate sourcemaps on changes

luau-lsp.sourcemap.rojoPath.markdownDescription: Path to the Rojo executable. If not provided, attempts to run `rojo` in the workspace directory, so it must be available on the PATH

luau-lsp.sourcemap.rojoProjectFile.markdownDescription:
The name of the Rojo project file to generate a sourcemap for.
Only applies if `#luau-lsp.sourcemap.autogenerate#` is enabled

luau-lsp.sourcemap.includeNonScripts.markdownDescription: Include non-script instances in the generated sourcemap

luau-lsp.sourcemap.sourcemapFile.markdownDescription: The name of the sourcemap file

luau-lsp.sourcemap.generatorCommand.markdownDescription: A command to run to generate the sourcemap. If not specified, defaults to `rojo`

luau-lsp.sourcemap.useVSCodeWatcher.markdownDescription: Whether the VSCode filesystem watchers are used to regenerate the sourcemap. If disabled, delegates to the generator process. If using `rojo`, this command stops using `--watch`

luau-lsp.format.convertQuotes.markdownDescription: Whether to automatically convert single/double quotes to backticks when typing `{` inside strings

luau-lsp.fflags.enableByDefault.markdownDescription: Enable all (boolean) Luau FFlags by default. These flags can later be overriden by `#luau-lsp.fflags.override#` and `#luau-lsp.fflags.sync#`

luau-lsp.fflags.enableNewSolver.markdownDescription: Enables the flags required for Luau's new type solver. These flags can be overriden by `#luau-lsp.fflags.override#`

luau-lsp.fflags.sync.markdownDescription:
Sync currently enabled FFlags with Roblox's published FFlags.
This currently only syncs FFlags which begin with 'Luau'

luau-lsp.diagnostics.includeDependents.markdownDescription: Recompute diagnostics for dependents when a file changes. If `#luau-lsp.diagnostics.workspace#` is enabled, this is ignored

luau-lsp.diagnostics.workspace.markdownDescription: Compute diagnostics for the whole workspace

luau-lsp.diagnostics.strictDatamodelType.markdownDescription: Use strict DataModel types in diagnostics. When on, this is equivalent to the more expressive autocompletion types. When this is off, `game`/`script`/`workspace` (and their members) are all typed as `any`, and helps to prevent false positives. [Read More](https://github.com/JohnnyMorganz/luau-lsp/issues/83#issuecomment-1192865024)

luau-lsp.diagnostics.pullOnChange.markdownDescription: Whether to update document diagnostics whenever the text file changes

luau-lsp.diagnostics.pullOnSave.markdownDescription: Whether to update document diagnostics whenever the text file is saved

luau-lsp.types.definitionFiles.markdownDescription: A mapping of package names to paths of definition files to load in to the type checker. Note that definition file syntax is currently unstable and may change at any time

luau-lsp.types.documentationFiles.markdownDescription: A list of paths to documentation files which provide documentation support to the definition files provided

luau-lsp.types.disabledGlobals.markdownDescription: A list of globals to remove from the global scope. Accepts full libraries or particular functions (e.g., `table` or `table.clone`)

luau-lsp.types.roblox.markdownDescription: Load in and automatically update Roblox type definitions for the type checker

luau-lsp.types.robloxSecurityLevel.markdownDescription: Security Level to use in the Roblox API definitions

luau-lsp.inlayHints.parameterNames.markdownDescription: Show inlay hints for function parameter names

luau-lsp.inlayHints.variableTypes.markdownDescription: Show inlay hints for variable types

luau-lsp.inlayHints.parameterTypes.markdownDescription: Show inlay hints for parameter types

luau-lsp.inlayHints.functionReturnTypes.markdownDescription: Show inlay hints for function return types

luau-lsp.inlayHints.hideHintsForErrorTyp.markdownDescription: Whether type hints should be hidden if they resolve to an error type

luau-lsp.inlayHints.hideHintsForMatching.markdownDescription: Whether type hints should be hidden if the resolved variable name matches the parameter name

luau-lsp.inlayHints.typeHintMaxLength.markdownDescription: The maximum length a type hint should be before being truncated

luau-lsp.inlayHints.makeInsertable.markdownDescription: Whether type annotation inlay hints can be made insertable by clicking

luau-lsp.hover.multilineFunctionDefiniti.markdownDescription: Show function definitions on multiple lines

luau-lsp.hover.strictDatamodelTypes.markdownDescription: Use strict DataModel types in hover display. When on, this is equivalent to autocompletion types. When off, this is equivalent to diagnostic types

luau-lsp.hover.includeStringLength.markdownDescription: Show string length when hovering over a string literal

luau-lsp.autocompleteEnd.markdownDescription: Automatically insert an `end` when opening a block

luau-lsp.completion.autocompleteEnd.markdownDescription: Automatically insert an `end` when opening a block

luau-lsp.completion.addParentheses.markdownDescription: Add parentheses after completing a function call

luau-lsp.completion.addTabstopAfterParen.markdownDescription: If `#luau-lsp.completion.addParentheses#` is enabled, then include a tabstop after the parentheses for the cursor to move to

luau-lsp.completion.fillCallArguments.markdownDescription: Fill parameter names in an autocompleted function call, which can be tabbed through. Requires `#luau-lsp.completion.addParentheses#` to be enabled

luau-lsp.completion.showPropertiesOnMeth.markdownDescription: Whether to show non-function properties when performing a method call with a colon (e.g., `foo:bar`)

luau-lsp.completion.showKeywords.markdownDescription: Whether to show keywords (`if` / `then` / `and` / etc.) during autocomplete

luau-lsp.completion.suggestImports.markdownDescription: Suggest automatic imports in completion items

luau-lsp.completion.imports.enabled.markdownDescription: Suggest automatic imports in completion items

luau-lsp.completion.imports.suggestServi.markdownDescription: Whether GetService completions are suggested in autocomplete

luau-lsp.completion.imports.includedServ.markdownDescription: When non-empty, only show the services listed when auto-importing

luau-lsp.completion.imports.excludedServ.markdownDescription: Do not show any of the listed services when auto-importing

luau-lsp.completion.imports.suggestRequi.markdownDescription: Whether module requires are suggested in autocomplete

luau-lsp.completion.imports.requireStyle.markdownDescription: The style of requires when autocompleted
enumDescriptions: Automatically compute the style of require to use based on heuristics
Always require the module relative to the current file
Always require the module absolute based on root

luau-lsp.completion.imports.stringRequir.markdownDescription: Whether to use string requires when auto-importing requires. Only checked if `#luau-lsp.platform.type#` is `roblox`

luau-lsp.completion.imports.separateGrou.markdownDescription: Whether services and requires should be separated by an empty line

luau-lsp.completion.imports.ignoreGlobs.markdownDescription: Files that match these globs will not be shown during auto-import

luau-lsp.completion.enableFragmentAutoco.markdownDescription: Enables the experimental fragment autocomplete system for performance improvements

luau-lsp.plugin.enabled.markdownDescription: Use Roblox Studio Plugin to provide DataModel information

luau-lsp.plugin.port.markdownDescription: Port number to connect to the Studio Plugin

luau-lsp.plugin.maximumRequestBodySize.markdownDescription: The maximum request body size accepted from the plugin, in a string representation parse-able by the [bytes](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bytes) library

luau-lsp.require.fileAliases.markdownDescription: A mapping of custom require string aliases to file paths
luau-lsp.require.fileAliases.markdownDeprecationMessage: **Deprecated**: Please use `aliases` in a `.luaurc` file instead.
luau-lsp.require.fileAliases.deprecationMessage: Deprecated: Please use aliases in a .luaurc file instead.

luau-lsp.require.directoryAliases.markdownDescription: A mapping of custom require string prefixes to directory paths. The aliases should include trailing slashes
luau-lsp.require.directoryAliases.markdownDeprecationMessage: **Deprecated**: Please use `aliases` in a `.luaurc` file instead.
luau-lsp.require.directoryAliases.deprecationMessage: Deprecated: Please use aliases in a .luaurc file instead.

luau-lsp.require.useOriginalRequireByStr.markdownDescription: Use the old require-by-string semantics for init.luau resolution
luau-lsp.require.useOriginalRequireByStr.markdownDeprecationMessage: **Deprecated**: Use the new require-by-string semantics instead. This option may be removed at any time in the future
luau-lsp.require.useOriginalRequireByStr.deprecationMessage: Deprecated: Use the new require-by-string semantics instead. This option may be removed at any time in the future

luau-lsp.index.enabled.markdownDescription: Whether all files in a workspace should be indexed into memory. If disabled, only limited support is available for features such as 'Find All References' and 'Rename'

luau-lsp.index.maxFiles.markdownDescription: The maximum amount of files that can be indexed. If more files are indexed, more memory is needed

luau-lsp.bytecode.debugLevel.markdownDescription: The `debugLevel` to use when compiling bytecode

luau-lsp.bytecode.typeInfoLevel.markdownDescription: The `typeInfoLevel` to use when compiling bytecode

luau-lsp.bytecode.vectorLib.markdownDescription: The `vectorLib` to use when compiling bytecode

luau-lsp.bytecode.vectorCtor.markdownDescription: The `vectorCtor` to use when compiling bytecode

luau-lsp.bytecode.vectorType.markdownDescription: The `vectorType` to use when compiling bytecode

walkthroughs.title: Getting Started with Luau
walkthroughs.description: An initial setup guide for the Luau Language Server

steps.title: Select your Platform
steps.description:
This extension provides out-of-the-box support for Roblox projects. If you are working in a separate environment, you may want to set your platform to ``standard``
[Configure Platform](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22luau-lsp.platform.type%22)

steps.title: Register Custom Definitions
steps.description:
If you work in an environment with custom global definitions, you can register these types to support type-checking and autocomplete
[Configure Type Definitions](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22luau-lsp.types%22)

steps.title: Configure Sourcemap Generation
steps.description:
A sourcemap provides a mapping between your paths on the file system to locations in the Roblox DataModel. By default, we automatically generate sourcemaps based on [Rojo](https://github.com/rojo-rbx/rojo) projects.
[Configure Sourcemap Generation](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%22luau-lsp.sourcemap%22)

steps.title: Install the Companion Plugin
steps.description:
A companion plugin is available in Roblox Studio. This allows type-checking and autocomplete to work on Instances that are only available in Studio, and not on your file system
[Install Companion Plugin](https://www.roblox.com/library/10913122509/Luau-Language-Server-Companion)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
